## WorkspaceSvg.addTopComment() method

Adds a comment to the list of top comments.


|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  comment | [WorkspaceComment](./blockly.workspacecomment.md) | comment to add. |
